item.title: CEO of Southeast Asia's largest bank says AI adoption already paying off: ‘It’s not hope, it’s now’
item.description: DBS CEO Tan Su Shan says AI adoption efforts are already paying off, despite broader concerns about weak returns on investment from AI initiatives.

item.title: Markets no longer view the December rate cut as a sure bet, with Fed officials casting doubts
item.description: Fed Chair Jerome Powell wasn't kidding a couple weeks ago when he said a December rate cut wasn't in the bag.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Walt Disney, Sweetgreen, Cisco, Planet Fitness and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: TKO, Polymarket strike multiyear deal to integrate prediction markets into UFC events
item.description: The deal makes UFC and Zuffa Boxing the first sports organizations to incorporate prediction market technology into live events.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Walt Disney, Cisco Systems, Firefly Aerospace and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.
